songs.title: Heavy
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Juice WRLD]
Uh huh, yeah

[Chorus: Juice WRLD]
Sip on fo' fo's, tippin' wit' a bad ho
Full of shit, ask niggas I'm a asshole
On the scene with my .40, with my cash flow
Throw a band, she gon' drop the ass low
Told that bitch to ride my dick just like a lasso
I was taught to let live, then to let go
I was taught to pull up, with the shell toes
I'm the clutch, Shaquille O'Neal throwin' them elbows

[Verse 1: Juice WRLD]
I be high, man in the mirror
Pop a Xan, pop a Perc, then I disappear
Too much stress up in the room I get outta here
Pull up on the scene, ball like finger roll
Eyes red they around smoking on that demon hoe gas
Rarri I'ma start it do the dash
I'ma leave that bitch right in the past
